values.description:
We’re a full service digitalmarketing agency in the UK and Australia, and here's what we can do for you!

At ROARlocal we use scientific advertising methods to bring more visitors to your website. Then we optimise your website so more of those visitors become profit making customers. We help organisations realise exponential profit growth using the Internet.

We have a smart team of über geeks that can effectively create, deploy, assess, and refine online marketing campaigns; and we do it with a unique structure and team that’s a cut above the average internet marketers. 

When you hire us, you’re not buying prestige, fancy furniture or a cookie cutter approach. What you’re hiring is how we think. You see, we’re entrepreneurs at ROARlocal, just like you. Everything we’ll do for your business we’ve already successfully tested in one of ours.

We're extremely proud to say our customers love us! Our goal is to make you so much money that you can’t imagine a world without us.

Read about how we’ve grown our customers businesses here:

http://roarlocal.com/services/testimonials/

Here's a snippet:

Added £65,000 To Our Business

“We saw a 20% increase in sales that meant we had to employ a new member of staff to deal with it added £65,000 to our business, we’re very happy.” John Wilkinson, Prontaprint Brighton

Check out our website to see how we can help your business :

United Kingdom - http://www.roarlocal.com
Australia - http://www.roarlocal.com.au
values.name: ROARLocal

values.description:
Need a WOW factor for a Corporate Event, Private Party, Hen or Stag Do, Fundraiser or Day Out with colleagues, family or friends?

X Marks The Spot turn the popular Treasure Hunt into innovative team building events, unique sightseeing travel guides and fun party activities across the UK and Europe.

From ready-made self-run treasure hunts for couples to highly interactive fully-facilitated team challenges using the latest technology, we’ve got it covered.

Get clued up. Start looking where X Marks The Spot.

We can provide events:
FOR ALL AGES & ABILITIES.
ANYWHERE - city or rural, in hotels and venues, or outside.
FOR ANY OCCASION - from corporate events to private parties, birthday, anniversary,charity, celebration, wedding, school and more.

Some of our popular treasure hunt destination countries include:
UK, Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, England, France, Germany, Greece, Holland, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Portugal, Scotland, Spain, Switzerland, Wales.

Some of our popular treasure hunt destination cities include:
Amsterdam, Athens, Barcelona, Bath, Belfast, Berlin, Birmingham, Brighton, Bristol, Bruges, Brussels, Budapest, Cambridge, Cardiff, Cologne, Copenhagen, Dublin, Edinburgh, Florence, Glasgow, Leeds, Lisbon, Liverpool, London, London Kensington, London Richmond Surrey, London South Bank, London West End, Manchester, Newcastle, Nottingham, Oxford, Paris, Prague, Rome, Stratford-upon-Avon, Venice, Vienna, Windsor, York, Zurich.

values: Events for Corporate Team Building, Conferences & Corporate Hospitality
Fun things to do on a day out with colleagues, friends or family

values.name: X Marks The Spot Ltd

values.description:
Platinum Packaging provides excellent value stationery and office supplies to businesses in London and Brighton.

Platinum Packaging offers its clients over 25 years experience in the jewellery packaging and stationery trade.

Through our extensive list of suppliers, market knowledge and buying power, we can meet every requirement...FOR EVERY TYPE OF BUSINESS!

Ordering is easy - email, fax or phone before 4.00pm and orders are delivered next day!
If you cannot find what you are looking for, please give us a call. We are constantly adding to our product range.

Want us to compare your office products purchases. Contact us and one of our account managers will be in touch to see how we can help you save money. What could be easier?

All aspects of printing are also available. Please ring for more information.

NEW - We now offer a secure shredding service. Get in touch to find out more

Contact Terry Harwood or Liz Gaunt on 020 7831 7323
Email: admin@platinumpackaging.co.uk
values.name: Platinum Packaging (UK) Ltd
Concrete Rose Productions
values.description:
Concrete Rose Productions is a film production company based in Brighton, England. 

The aim of Concrete Rose is to produce films which entertain, inform and emotionally engage an audience. Whether that be through the production of narrative film or documentary, Concrete Rose always look to push the boundaries of modern British filmmaking through the use of innovative techniques and the ever changing technologies available to the filmmaker. 

Having created a wealth of fiction material in its short form in their first year through Writer/Director pair Nicholas Jessup and Dino Kazamia the company looks forward to stepping up to the next level throughout the course of this year.

Equally, through the talented works of Sam Franklyn, alongside producer Nicholas Jessup, the company look forward to expanding on their promising documentary department.

A  Registered Investment Advisory firm, Caitlin John, LLC  is a private wealth management firm with its corporate office located in Brighton, Michigan. As a fee-only asset management advisory firm we have a strong vested interest in our clients success. We work hand in hand with individual  and institutional investors focusing on both capital appreciation and  income strategies utilizing advanced risk management techniques.

values: Complete clients service for more than 4 decades
Transparency to the clients regarding portfolio holdings and risks invoved
Dynamic investment models designed to minimize risk and maximize returns

values.name: Caitlin John, LLC

values.description:
Established in 1909, John D Clarke (Chartered) Architects has a longstanding reputation for high quality architecture, design, building conservation and project management.

Working from our main office in Eastbourne and with an increasing presence in Brighton, we undertake a wide range of architectural and conservation projects throughout Sussex and the South East.  Our dedicated and enthusiastic team of architects, technologists and office staff constantly strive to provide a professional and reliable service with flair and a strong belief in the intrinsic value of a beautiful built environment.

We work with Local Authorities, businesses, charities, private clients and Churches of all denominations.

We maintain the highest professional and technical standards, offering a bespoke service, tailored to our clients’ specific needs.

values: Surveys, 3-d Visuaisation, Planning Applications, Building Regulations

values.name: John D Clarke Architects

values.description:
Established in 1995, with the objective of enhancing mutual co-operation and foster connections among takaful operators globally.

Stage 1
-The ASEAN Takaful Group was formed on 28 October 1995 as an informal group
 -Its founding members were Syarikat Takaful Malaysia, PT Asuransi Takaful Umum, PT Asuransi akaful Keluarga, Insurans Islam Taib and Takaful IBB
-Secretariat: Syarikat Takaful Malaysia Berhad

Stage 2
-Change its name to Asian Takaful Group following resolution of members during AGM in Colombo, Sri Lanka in 2004 in order to reflect membership across a larger geographical area
-No of members: 15
-Secretariat: Asean Retakaful International (L) (ARIL)

Stage 3

-Legally incorporated in May 2007 as a company limited by guarantee in Labuan. The secretariat was passed on from ARIL to Labuan Re
-Renamed as Global Takaful Group to accommodate worldwide membership
-No of members: 49
-Secretariat was outsourced to Malaysian Takaful Association (MTA) and an Executive Secretary was appointed Effective from 1 July, 2011, Brighton Management Limited was appointned as the Secretariat
values.name: Global Takaful Group

values.description:
WiredMonkeys is a full-service web development and technical support company based in Brighton. We offer everything from hosting and SEO services to website development and data integration.

We create user-friendly, bespoke websites that are search engine optimized and easily editable. Whether you’re looking for a complete new build, or some simple site enhancements we guarantee a fast, friendly service.
values.name: WiredMonkeys Ltd

values.description:
From our offices in the city of Brighton & Hove our experienced and friendly team advise clients worldwide on tax and financial issues. 

Our business revolves around relationships as much as numbers. We take time to understand the requirements of our clients and their businesses to ensure we deliver effective advice.
values.name: McPhersons Walpole Harding

values.description:
Loch Associates Employment Lawyers provides solutions focused employment law advice to businesses on a variety of workplace issues including managing employee absence, redundancy and exit planning for senior employees. 

With offices in London, Brighton and Tunbridge Wells we are recognised as a leading Employment Law firm. 

Practising solely in the area of employment law, we use our specialist knowledge and skills, along with a commercial approach to provide a high-quality, added value service to our clients.

We provide advice to businesses across a wide range of sectors, acting for SMEs and charities through to companies employing thousands of employees. We give our clients practical solutions and peace of mind to continue expanding and running their successful businesses.

Working closely with our sister company, HR Advise Me Ltd, the combined team of employment lawyers and human resources consultants use their specialist skills in this complex area to provide practical and accurate advice with the bigger picture in mind.

Established in 2007 by Managing Partner, Pam Loch, Loch Associates Employment Lawyers has experienced significant growth, with the team regularly appearing on national and local television and radio shows as well as contributing to publications on employment law issues. 

Why not check out our Products and Services tab for more information on how Loch Associates can help your business?
values.name: Loch Associates Employment Lawyers Limited
Grapevine City Ltd
values.description:
Grapevine City is a free smartphone application for bars, venues and you. Available across on iPhone for free. 

The app covers cities across the UK including...

London     Edinburgh    Liverpool    Manchester     Leeds     Cambridge     Oxford
Brighton    Birmingham     Newcastle    Nottingham   Sheffield   Leicester     Derby   

With more than 750 of the best cocktail bars, live music venues, student nights and parties listed on the app. 

The app allows users to plan their night to a set budget, with a huge list of drink and music offerings, uploaded by the venues; all at the touch of a button.  Great, if you’re familiar with a city and want to delve deeper. If your not, it’s even better. You can unlock the nightlife secrets of your new location with your favourite companion, the smartphone.

Providing innovative and highly targeted marketing opportunities to a wide range of businesses as well as insightful data on consumer trends. 

It's FREE to download and allows you to search across the nightlife of a city based on what's important to them.

The information is provided by the bars, clubs and venues and updated instantly to the app.

750+ of the best bars, clubs and venues using the app across the UK.

We have been featured in several 'app of the week' sections of trade and mainstream press.

Reached number 2 in the iTunes 'what's hot' chart behind only Groupon and ahead of Jamie Oliver, 118 and over 16,000 others.

I. R. Rudy's, Inc operates three storefronts - Rudy's Clothing, Downtown Oakland, MD; Rudy's at Wisp Resort, McHenry, MD; Rudy's Mountaintop Outfitters at ASCI, McHenry, MD.

Rudy's Clothing is a downtown specialty boutique offering a store of nice surprises.  All the apparel & accessories are hand-picked and unique from Vera Bradley, Brighton, Tribal, French Dressing & others.  Open Monday - Friday 9-6pm & Saturday 9-5pm.

Rudy's at Wisp Resort is your Deep Creek lifestyle shop offering a full selection of downhill ski & snowboard, swimwear & accessories, and Wisp Resort & DCL souvenirs.  Open Daily 9-6pm, Sunday 9-4pm

Rudy's Mountaintop Outfitters is the newest specialty shop for I. R Rudy's, Inc.  Open in the Adventure Sports Center International, your adventures starts with us!  RMO specializes in paddle, hiking & trail running, mountain lifestyle apparel, as well as gifts & souvenirs.  Open Thursday - Sunday until Memorial Day.  Then Open Daily 9-6pm thru Labor Day.
values.name: I. R. Rudy's, Inc

values.description:
The Beaver Area Chamber of Commerce, as a 501(c)(6) Non-Profit, is committed to helping the local business community. Who makes up the Beaver Area Chamber of Commerce? Local business owners and professionals in Beaver, Bridgewater, Brighton TWP. and Vanport TWP., who realize that their neighbors’ success has a direct effect on their own success, and as a group make a stronger competitor to those that would steal away our thriving local marketplace one shop or practice at a time.

Through the chamber’s sponsorship of local events, holiday marketing, and other programs, it makes a conscious effort to promote and strengthen our local business community and our community as a whole.
values.name: Beaver Area Chamber of Commerce

values.description:
PAYG workspace for professionals and creatives to think, work and collaborate.
With super fast Internet included as standard.
You might want to connect to us.

Reigatehub was formed from a solid belief that mixing professionals and creatives with accessible high speed broadband, a private cloud infrastructure and great space to work can only result in the formation of a super community of other like minded entrepreneurs and businesses.   

Focused on facilitating the mobile professional and start-up business, we picked a location with:

direct rail links to London, Brighton, Reading, Guildford. 
easy access to Heathrow and Gatwick airports
good road links to Surrey and the M25. 
3 meeting rooms 
1 board room  
8 mixed size offices/co-working spaces for 32 people

and added ...

a private cloud infrastructure 
Virgin Big Red Internet
PAYG Billing
A play area: for mums and dads that need to work. (Subject to strict terms)

so you can have .... 

the great place to work you want and need now.

values: secure private cloud vdi and web hosting
PAYG supervised playroom (Only for use by onsite clients)

values.name: Reigatehub

values.description:
TL Stewart Builders is a family-owned building business led by Terry Stewart and wife, Sandra Holt Stewart. They have developed Carter's Grove, Hampton Ponds, and Brighton Park, among others, also having built several homes in the exclusive Governors Club in Chatham County and Forest Creek in Moore County. They have also build a mountain home off the Blue Ridge Parkway just outside Blowing Rock, NC. TL Stewart Builders' newest development is Carbonton Cove in Sanford, NC.

Featured Services:
-Design-Build Services for New Custom Home and Commercial Building
-Pella Select Contractor, We offer Pella Windows and Doors (new or replacement)
-Historic Renovations – William Alston Rives House Built c. 1832
-Consultations for Interior and Exterior Designs
-UpKeepers – Maintenance, repairs, Window and Door Replacements, Kitchen and Bath Renovations, Granite Counter Tops, Sunroom Additions
-NC Certified Home Inspector available
-Go Green
values.name: TL Stewart Builders

values.description:
Established in 1994, we are one of the UK’s most innovative design agencies specialising in creative design for the arts. We’ve extensive experience working closely with arts organisations, festivals, museums, cultural service sectors and heritage departments of local authorities, theatres, producers and corporate clients within hospitality, e-gaming and hoteliers.

 Over the years we’ve amassed a sizeable and desperately heavy portfolio of work that contains beautiful and iconic campaigns that often bring a smile to peoples’ faces: from the Rococo extravagance of Vivienne Westwood – to the colour of The Paramount Brighton Comedy Festival. From the sobering duty of Commission for Social Care Inspection – to the splendour of Shakepeares’s Globe Theatre. For each, we’ve developed creative and beautiful campaigns that demand attention and typify the zeitgeist that reflects the cultural diversity of the society we all enjoy today.

The Scarlet team understand the value of the Arts and Culture as part of an integrated public service: that’s why we’ve chosen to work in it for twenty years.  We need a committed platform to roll-out cultural heritage to all those within our lives.  The challenges needed are a direct representation of the way we enable access and work within our social framework. Young people are our greatest resource - and we need to understand the challenges they face that mirror both our lives now, and in the future.
values.name: SCARLET Graphics Ltd

values.description:
For Absolute Satisfaction in Seamless Gutters in the Denver Area

For a free estimate call 303-903-5384 or Email info@absolute-gutters.com

Absolute Gutters is locally owned and operated by Tim Tonak. Tim has been hanging gutters for 10 years, and he started Absolute Gutters from the ground up in Denver in 2005.

Absolute Gutters serves the entire Denver, Colorado Metro area, including Thornton, Northglenn, Westminster, Broomfield, Brighton, Reunion, Arvada, Wheat Ridge, Englewood, Golden, Boulder, Longmont, Aurora, Littleton, Highlands Ranch, and more!

As an owner-operated company, we give individual attention to each job, strive to do your job right the first time, and stand behind our work. Because we specialize almost entirely in gutter work, we are able to provide the best service while keeping prices low. We are hardworking, honest people who try to have some fun as we enjoy getting around Denver and seeing it from new angles every day.

We work year round hanging gutters, so don't be afraid to call us in the winter. We'll get to your gutter job quickly and professionally. Not every day is perfect for hanging gutters but, rest assured that we will get your job taken care of in a timely fashion.

We're happy to come to your residence for a free estimate, whether you will be home or not. This way, you're ensured an accurate price from us.
values.name: Absolute Gutters

values.description:
Select, a Brighton based company, has been offering specialised security and stewarding services to the event industry for over 10 years. Select can also provide Door Supervision services for any venue or corporate event, large or small.

Select’s main emphasis is on creating safe environments, and with this in mind, Select is able to offer a service that starts at conception and continues with a high level of support, through to execution and follow up.
values.name: Select Security & Stewarding Ltd

values.description:
Founded in 1996 and based in Brighton on the South Coast of England, Barcoding Solutions work with all the leading manufacturers to ensure that we can offer the best possible solution at the best possible price.

Combined with our own in-house software capabilities, this enables us to provide a bespoke system at extremely competitive rates.

We offer completely FREE and impartial advice on any barcode requirement that you may have and will always be happy to meet with you to discuss your requirements and provide an outline specification and quotation without any commitment from yourselves.
values.name: Barcoding Solutions Limited

values.description:
Monkfish Web Design is a leading  website design and creative agency, providing professional website design, Ecommerce and Content Management Systems (CMS) as well as branding and graphic design solutions for both private businesses and the public sector in the London, Nottingham (East Midlands), Hasting & Brighton area.

Why compromise? As a leading web design agency, we have website packages for all types of customers, from start up business to corporate customers. All of our websites feature the latest web 2.0 technologies and helpful service throughout. Our high-calibre professional website designers guarantee that our clients acquire the high quality website that will not only achieve all its objectives, but surpass your expectations.

Not only do we specialise in professional web design and re-designs, domain name registration and web hosting, but we also offer a vast range of internet marketing tools, which include search engine submissions and placement advertising and email and sms marketing.

With websites built and designed for as little as £499 Monkfish Web Design offers a great all round package.  To find out how our website design team can help you call free on 0800 161 3879
values.name: Monkfish Web Design
